instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Initialize a Next.js 14 app structure (using 'src' directory).
2. Configure Tailwind CSS with the 'Obsidian & Gold' palette in tailwind.config.js.
3. Create the 'components/ui' folder for reusable atoms (Buttons, Cards).
4. Implement the 'MagneticButton' and 'RoleCycler' in the Hero section.
5. Build the 'BentoGrid' for the Skills/Leadership section.
6. Use 'framer-motion' for all animations. DO NOT use CSS transitions for layout changes.
7. Ensure the Contact form uses the 'GlassForm' style.
8. Use the provided asset URLs. If local media is missing, use placeholders but keep the paths.
9. STRICTLY use .js or .jsx extensions. Do not use TypeScript (.ts/.tsx).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Avoid generic centered layouts; use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing (p-8, p-12) than standard.
Dark mode is the default and ONLY mode for this bespoke portfolio.
